title: Dont Starve Together (v134235) (RoG)
description:
== About the game:
AN UNCOMPROMISING WILDERNESS SURVIVAL GAME FULL OF SCIENCE AND MAGIC.
Play as Wilson, an intrepid Gentleman Scientist who has been trapped by a demon and transported to a mysterious wilderness world. Wilson must learn to exploit his environment and its inhabitants if he ever hopes to escape and find his way back home. Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style. Play it your own way as you unravel the mysteries of this strange land.


== Features (upcoming):
DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t Starve Together:
Game Modes - There are three game modes intended: Survival, Endless and Wilderness.
Mods - Mods will be supported, yet many of them that rewrite core code will need to update to the new format.
Ghosts - Ghost Players are a new feature that introduces the ability to live after death, although in a downgraded state.
Rebalancing - Various rebalance tweaks including thermal stones, armor, willow enemies health.
New Entities - Meteors and The Ewecus
Sleeping - when on a server, sleeping will not fast forward to sunrise but will instead leave the player unable to move and not affected by the night monster.
Map - The map has changed and there is now a fog of war, meaning that what is shown on the map is the version last seen.



== Version:
Steam v134235 full game with Reign of Giants, by LuKeStorm from Apr 21 2015. 
Thanks to LuKeStorm for updating


== Version changes:
134235 - 
(to keep this page aethetically pleasing I'll shorten these changes)

== DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t Starve Together == 
Stuff thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s getting added:
 Playable characters Wigfrid and Webber.
Two seasons: Spring and Summer. Season previously known as Summer will be henceforth known as Autumn.
Two new biomes: the Desert and the Deciduous Forest. Both are filled with new creatures, plants and gatherables. 
Giants for every season! Deerclops isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t the only big bad lurking out there, now.

Mechanical changes:
Rabbits and other small creatures that can go in your inventory need food too! 
Food left on crockpots and on drying racks will start spoiling before you collect it. 
If your characters get wet enough, theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll start cooling down and losing sanity.
Previously, the rain would directly make you lose sanity.
Structures with wood in them can burn. You can hammer down the burnt husk to get some resources back.

== Reign of Giants ==
Fire propagation has been reworked. 
The Ice Flingomatic has an emergency mode instead of being turned completely off. 
Giants are generally more present in the world, rather than jerks who come down from the proverbial hills to harass one unlucky player per season.
The color of a Thermal Stone is now based on its temperature relative to the ambient temperature of the world.


== Instructions:1. Extract anywhere with compression software (like 7zip - download link below)
2. Copy the content from the "Crack" folder into the game folder.
3. Open "SmartSteamEmu.ini" file and change "PersonaName" to your nick.
4. Play (You can only play LAN/VPN)


== System Requirements:
Minimum:
Pentium 4 1.7GHz/Athlon MP
GeForce 315 512MB/Radeon HD 5450 256MB
1 GB RAM 
Win Xp 32
DirectX 9
500 MB hard disk space

Recommended:
Pentium 4 3.46GHz/Athlon LE-1600
GeForce GT 320/Radeon HD 5550 512MB
2 GB RAM 
Win 7 32
DirectX 9
500 MB hard disk space


 ============
 OTHER/INFO
 ============
 SteamID
 Each player requires a different SteamID at this game.
 A random SteamID is created automatically when you first start.
 Is saved in the "steam_id.ini" file. (SmartSteamEmu folder)
